Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); FeedbackUI_Show();

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Back, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then this:GetParent().panels[index].Submit(this:GetParent().panels[index])
end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Reset, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Start, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end
this:GetParent():GetParent().input:SetFocus() this:GetParent():GetParent().input:HighlightText(0)
this.panel.MoveScroll(this.panel, -1);
this.panel.MoveScroll(this.panel, 1);
if ( this.scroll.thumb:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then this.panel.ScrollOnUpdate(this.panel, 1); end this:Lower();
if ( this.scroll:GetParent().Click ) then this.scroll:GetParent().Click(this.scroll:GetParent(), this.element, this) end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");
this.parent:Click()
ToggleDropDownMenu(); PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

Scripts.OnLoad: this:GetParent().tooltip = this; this:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_NONE") this:SetText("Test") this:ClearLines() this:Hide()

Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Back, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Skip, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then this:GetParent().panels[index].Submit(this:GetParent().panels[index])
end end

PlaySound("GAMEGENERICBUTTONPRESS"); for index, panel in pairs(this:GetParent().panels) do if ( panel.name == "StepThroughPanel" ) then pcall(this:GetParent().panels[index].Reset, this:GetParent().panels[index]) end end
